usage_rules: Nav links and buttons MUST use Manrope Uppercase.
Price tags MUST use Manrope with 'tabular-nums' class.
Never use bold weight for headings; rely on size and font-family for hierarchy.

grid_patterns: Use 'Bento' grids: mix of 1x1, 2x1, and 2x2 cells.
Product grids should be strictly 2-column on mobile, 4-column on desktop.
Hero section must be full viewport height (min-h-screen).

buttons.primary: bg-white text-black hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-black rounded-none px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm font-bold transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:border-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none px-8 py-4 uppercase tracking-widest text-sm transition-all duration-300
buttons.ghost: text-white/70 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-xs

cards.feature: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-white/5 p-8 hover:border-[#D4AF37]/30 transition-colors duration-500

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 rounded-none px-0 py-4 focus:border-[#D4AF37] focus:ring-0 placeholder:text-white/20 text-lg transition-colors

navigation.style: fixed top-0 w-full z-50 bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-xl border-b border-white/5

motion.micro_interactions: All interactive elements must have a scale-95 active state and a color transition on hover.

assets.icons: Use 'lucide-react' with thin stroke width (1.5px) to match the elegant typography.

instructions_to_main_agent: THEME_SETUP: Apply the dark theme colors globally in `index.css`. The entire app (except maybe admin) should default to dark mode.
NAVIGATION: Create a 'mega-menu' style nav or a very clean, centered logo nav with split links (Shop left, About right).
PRODUCT_CARD: Do NOT use a border on the card. Use the image aspect-ratio-[4/5]. Text below should be minimal.
WHATSAPP_CHECKOUT: The checkout flow is: Cart -> Form (Name, Address) -> 'Order via WhatsApp' Button. No stripe/payment integration.
ADMIN_PANEL: This can be a simpler, lighter theme or a 'Command Center' dark theme. Prioritize data density here.
UNIVERSAL_RULE: If it looks like a standard Bootstrap/Material site, it is wrong. It must look like a fashion magazine.
IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
TESTING: Add `data-testid` to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, links).

must_use: Smooth scrolling (Lenis recommended if possible, or standard smooth behavior)
